results.name: Period 2: repeat (2,7).
comment: Continued fraction expansion of A176054. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 08 2012
Decimal expansion of 3/11. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 21 2018
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(2 + 7 x)/((1 - x) (1 + x)), {x, 0, 120}], x] (* or *)
Table[NestWhile[Total@ IntegerDigits@ # &, 2^n + 5^n, IntegerLength@ # > 1 &], {n, 0, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 13 2016 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
